Name: 50 Days To Survive
About the game: A new adventure begins! Survive in a new hostile and arid environment, lost in the middle of the dunes. You will have to face sandstorms and high temperatures. Find an oasis, explore wildlife and collect resources. Beware of the dangers that await you like the mummies. Try to survive by building yourself a shelter until the helicopter picks you up after 50 days. Are you ready to take on this challenge and become the master of your own survival?
